titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Committee consideration held. Business Meeting printed. S. Hrg. 117-9.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Carper. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

term.name: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works to make specified expenditures and employ personnel for the 117th Congress.
